akn:section.akn:heading: Board of Trustees of National Museum of the American Indian

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The National Museum shall be under a Board of Trustees with the duties, powers, and authority specified in this section.
(b) General duties and powers The Board of Trustees shall—
(c) Sole authority Subject to the general policies of the Board of Regents, the Board of Trustees shall have the sole authority to—
(d) Authority Subject to the general policies of the Board of Regents, the Board of Trustees shall have authority to—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Subsequent appointments to Board of Trustees

akn:content.akn:p: (f) Subsequent appointments to Board of Trustees
(g) Quorum A majority of the members of the Board of Trustees then in office shall constitute a quorum.

(h) Expenses Members of the Board shall be entitled (to the same extent as provided in section 5703 of title 5 with respect to employees serving intermittently in the Government service) to per diem, travel, and transportation expenses for each day (including travel time) during which they are engaged in the performance of their duties.
